attributes.action: Create a national/regional network of job exchange internet sites where users can register their details
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The purpose is to encourage employers and employees to seek out possible job exchange opportunities that will reduce travelling time and associated costs/energy usage - I have to travel 65 miles round trip each day for work and wonder how many other people in similar employment are travelling the opposite way each day!
Just count how many previously observed cars you can see every day as you travel to and from work!
The same site could also be used to identify vehicle sharing opportunities.
